attributes.action: Sanction Russian energy & increase local energy production
attributes.additional_details:
Most dictator-caused wars are wars of energy eg 2nd world war - Hitler raced to Russian oil fields

Now Putin will soon control world energy and food markets!!!

Time to become Awake NOT Woke!
Freedom is always a struggle with sacrifice & force
attributes.background:
Ban all Russian energy imports which funds their aggression and growing military machine
Rapidly increase local & friendly-democratic-country energy production (all forms, due to emergency), to reduce blackmail risk.
Reconciles with CO2 emission reduction, in a sustainable and globally safe way!

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on the topic of Russian gas and oil, which you might like to sign:

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289

We currently have the below petitions open on the topic of increasing local energy production, which you might like to sign:

Increase UK green energy investment in geothermal sources
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597657

Commit to UK natural gas and increase investment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608274

End the ban on fracking
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608745
